whyDifferent.title: Why do prices differ?
whyDifferent.content: Each service uses different fee structures. Some charge flat fees, others use percentages, while most combine both. Additionally, different companies have varying operational costs and business models that affect their pricing. Transfer speed also plays a role - faster transfers typically cost more.

points.title: Speed vs Cost

points.title: Safety

points.title: Amount
points.content: For larger amounts, percentage fees matter more

points.title: Frequency
points.content: If you send often, look for membership services or lower fees
